title: Growing
provenance_text:
Giò Pomodoro [1930-2002], Milan Italy [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was exhibited (no. 358, plate 107) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on December 17, 1958. Payment to the artist was sent on February 17, 1959.

creator.birth_place: Morciano di Romagna (Rimini province, Emilia-Romagna, Italy)
